description: These are the photon ID, Pixel veto and CSEV Scale Factors and uncertainties for 2018 Ultra Legacy dataset. Each kind of scale factors and uncertainties, depend on the chosen working point, some other quantities. More information is below!

corrections.name: UL-Photon-ID-SF
corrections.description: These are the photon ID Scale Factors and uncertainties for 2018 Ultra Legacy dataset. They are available for the cut-based and MVA IDs. They are dependent on the transverse momenta and pseudorapidity of the photon.

inputs.name: ValType
inputs.description: sf or syst (Currently syst is total syst)

inputs.name: WorkingPoint
inputs.description: Working Point of choice : Loose, Medium etc.

output.name: weight
output.description: value of scale factor or systematic uncertainty

corrections.name: UL-Photon-PixVeto-SF
corrections.description: These are the Photon Pixel Veto Scale Factors and uncertainties for 2018 Ultra Legacy dataset. They are available for the cut-based and MVA IDs. For each working point of choice, they are dependent on the photon pseudorapidity and R9: Possible bin choices: ['EBInc','EBHighR9','EBLowR9','EEInc','EEHighR9','EELowR9']

inputs.name: ValType
inputs.description: sf or syst (Currently syst is total syst)

inputs.name: WorkingPoint
inputs.description: Working Point of choice : Loose, Medium etc.

output.name: weight
output.description: value of scale factor or systematic uncertainty

corrections.name: UL-Photon-CSEV-SF
corrections.description: These are the Photon CSEV Scale Factors and uncertainties for 2018 Ultra Legacy dataset. They are available for the cut-based and MVA IDs. For each working point of choice, they are dependent on the photon pseudorapidity and R9: Possible bin choices: ['EBInc','EBHighR9','EBLowR9','EEInc','EEHighR9','EELowR9']

inputs.name: ValType
inputs.description: sf or syst (Currently syst is total syst)

inputs.name: WorkingPoint
inputs.description: Working Point of choice : Loose, Medium etc.

output.name: weight
output.description: value of scale factor or systematic uncertainty
